title: Login issue
description: Customer cannot log in despite entering correct credentials. The issue persists across multiple browsers and devices, indicating a potential backend authentication error.

title: Payment gateway failure
description: Transactions are not being processed successfully. Customers report receiving a 'Payment Failed' message even when funds are available, suggesting a possible API outage.

title: UI bug on dashboard
description: The dashboard widgets are overlapping and causing layout issues on smaller screens. This impacts usability for mobile users significantly.

title: Email notification not sent
description: Automated email notifications are failing for password resets and order confirmations. This is affecting customer trust and support volume.

title: Slow page load
description: Home page takes more than 10 seconds to load due to unoptimized images and scripts. This issue could reduce user engagement and increase bounce rates.

title: API timeout
description: Third-party API calls are frequently timing out, leading to incomplete data rendering. Customers experience delays in order history retrieval.

title: Security vulnerability
description: Potential SQL injection detected in the search functionality. This poses a critical security risk if not fixed immediately.

title: Mobile app crash
description: The Android app crashes on startup for users running version 9.0 or lower. This affects nearly 25% of our mobile customer base.

title: Report generation delay
description: Financial and performance reports take too long to generate, with delays up to 3 minutes for large datasets. Customers require faster access.

title: Data sync issue
description: User data is not syncing properly between web and mobile platforms, leading to inconsistent information displayed across devices.

title: Broken image links
description: Several product images are not loading correctly on the e-commerce site, which may cause customers to lose confidence in the products.

title: Cart not updating
description: Items added to cart are not updating the cart count in real-time. This creates confusion for customers during checkout.

title: Search function broken
description: The search bar returns no results even for valid queries. This is severely limiting product discoverability for customers.

title: Delayed live chat response
description: Live chat support is delayed by up to 10 minutes, frustrating customers who expect immediate assistance.
